briefdescription.para: The attractor settings data. Attractor object reference must be assigned or orbit mover will not work.
The velocity handle object. Assign object and use it as velocity control handle in scene view.
The orbit data. Internal state of orbit.
Disable continious editing orbit in update loop, if you don't need it.

inbodydescription.para: Store attractor data as a name because attractor class is of type MonoBehaviour

detaileddescription.para: In this method orbit data is updating from view state: If you change body position, attractor mass or any other vital orbit parameter, this change will be noticed and applyed to internal OrbitData state in this method. If you need to change orbitData state directly, by script, you need to change OrbitData state and then call ForceUpdateOrbitData

briefdescription.para: Progress orbit path motion. Actual kepler orbiting is processed here.

detaileddescription.para: Orbit motion progress calculations must be placed after Update, so orbit parameters changes can be applyed, but before LateUpdate, so orbit can be displayed in same frame. Coroutine loop is best candidate for achieving this.

briefdescription.para: Updates OrbitData from new body position and velocity vectors.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be useful to assign new position of body by script. Or you can directly change OrbitData state and then manually update view.

briefdescription.para: Forces the update of body position, and velocity handler from OrbitData. Call this method after any direct changing of OrbitData.
Forces the update of internal orbit data from current world positions of body, attractor settings and velocityHandle.

detaileddescription.para: This method must be called after any manual changing of body position, velocity handler position or attractor settings. It will update internal OrbitData state from view state.

briefdescription.para: Change orbit velocity vector to match circular orbit.
Component for moving game object in eliptic or hyperbolic path around attractor body.
